item.title: Ukulele Time: The Way We Were - Barbra Streisand - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song The Way We Were from the channel Ukulele Time. Artist: Barbra Streisand. Chords: A7, Am, Am7, C, C7, Cmaj7, Dm7, E7, Em7, F, G7.
